#### **Mapa comparativo - Diferencia de votos obtenidos por el FdT entre 2019 y 2021 por departamento**.

```{r dpto, width= 12.5, fig.height = 8, fig.align= 'center'}
  ##MAPA por dpto
  
  
paldpto19fdt <- colorFactor('Blues',reverse = TRUE ,domain = base_pba1921$fdt_19)
paldpto21fdt <- colorFactor('Blues',reverse = TRUE ,domain = base_pba1921$fdt_21)
paldptodif1921 <- colorFactor('Reds',reverse = TRUE ,domain = base_pba1921$dif_FDT)
  
leaflet(base_pba1921) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>%
  addPolygons(popup = ~paste("Departamento: ", base_pba1921$nombre_seccion,
                               "</br>% FdT 2021: ", base_pba1921$fdt_21,
                               "</br>% FdT 2019: ", base_pba1921$fdt_19,
                               "</br>Diferencia %: ", base_pba1921$dif_FDT),
                fillColor = ~paldptodif1921(dif_FDT),
                weight = 0,
                fillOpacity = 0.9, group = "Diferencia Fdt 2019 vs 2021") %>%
  addPolylines(color = "white", weight = 0.6) %>% 
  addPolygons(popup = ~paste("Departamento: ", base_pba1921$nombre_seccion,
                               "</br>% FdT 2021: ", base_pba1921$fdt_21,
                               "</br>% FdT 2019: ", base_pba1921$fdt_19,
                               "</br>Diferencia %: ", base_pba1921$dif_FDT),
                fillColor = ~paldpto21fdt(fdt_21),
                weight = 0,
                fillOpacity = 0.9, group = "Votos Fdt 2021") %>% 
    addPolygons(popup = ~paste("Departamento: ", base_pba1921$nombre_seccion,
                               "</br>% FdT 2021: ", base_pba1921$fdt_21,
                               "</br>% FdT 2019: ", base_pba1921$fdt_19,
                               "</br>Diferencia %: ", base_pba1921$dif_FDT),
                fillColor = ~paldpto19fdt(fdt_19),
                weight = 0,
                fillOpacity = 0.9, group = "Votos Fdt 2019") %>% 
  addLayersControl(overlayGroups =  c("Votos Fdt 2021", "Votos Fdt 2019",
                                      "Diferencia %"),
                    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = F))
```
